name: Tamagotchi! Seshun no Doriimu Sukuru
description:
'Tamagotchi! Seshun no Doriimu Sukuru' (otherwise known as たまごっち！せーしゅんのドリームスクール) is a Tamagotchi game developed by Dimps Corporation for the Nintendo 3DS. It was released only in Japan on November 7th, 2013. It is based on the third anime series, 'Tamagotchi! Miracle Friends', and set in a school setting. It contains characters from both the original animated series, and 'Tamagotchi! Yume Kira Dream'. It is the fourth of six Tamagotchi 3DS entries.

*The game is about attending Dream School and befriending the Tamagotchis to help them with their classes. At first there are only a few minigames to play, but more classes and difficulty levels are unlocked as the game progresses. The player also has their own room which they are able to remodel, and the Tamagotchis they befriended come over.

(*Source of Description - 'Tamagotchi Fandom Wiki'; 'Tamagotchi! Classes of Dream School')
